content.title: Uses
content.description: Ornamental plant. Grown for its highly scented flowers. Floral essential oil (EO) is used for making perfumes using linalool. EO includes: linalool, methyl benzoate, benzyl acetate, cis-linalool oxide pyranoid, phenyl acetonitrile, 2- phenethyl alcohol, dihydro-ionone, -ionone, -ionone, dihydro-ionol, methyl anthranilate, indole, methyl palmitate, ionone oxime and methyl linoleate. Flower essential oil can be formulated into stick perfume preparation.
